attributes.background: With the risk Coventry City FC hosting its future 'home' games in another city or town, we call on the club's owners, SISU, the leadership of the club, Coventry City Council, the hierarchy of the English Football League and all other relevant stakeholders to help keep Coventry FC in Coventry.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
